channel.title: Rui Yang on Lei Zheng
channel.description: Recent content in Rui Yang on Lei Zheng

item.title: April 2022: New journal article of the IEEE Robotics and Automation Letters.
item.description: We propose a learning-based tracking control scheme based on a feedback linearization controller in which uncertain disturbances are approximated online using Gaussian Processes!

item.title: Safe Learning-Based Feedback Linearization Tracking Control for Nonlinear System with Event-Triggered Model Update
item.description: Supplementary notes can be added here, including code and math.

item.title: April 2022: New journal article of the International Federation of Automatic Control (IFAC).
item.description: The control framework integrates a learning-based MPC with an auxiliary controller in a way of minimal intervention!

item.title: Safe learning-based gradient-free model predictive control based on cross-entropy method
item.description: Supplementary notes can be added here, including code and math.

item.title: May 2021: New conference article of the American Control Conference.
item.description: Present a learning-based safety-preserving cascaded quadratic programming control policy for safe trajectory tracking under wind disturbances!

item.title: Safe learning-based tracking control for quadrotors under wind disturbances
item.description: Supplementary notes can be added here, including code and math.

item.title: April 2021: New journal article of the IEEE Robotics and Automation Letters.
item.description: Propose a learning-based MPFC control paradigm for nonlinear systems under uncertain disturbances, coupling a high-level model predictive path following controller for proactivity with a low-level learning-based feedback linearization controller for adaptivity. Following that, nonlinear systems can rapidly rejoin their reference trajectory after sudden wind disturbances with stability guarantees!

item.title: Learning-Based Predictive Path Following Control for Nonlinear Systems Under Uncertain Disturbances
item.description: Supplementary notes can be added here, including code and math.

item.title: Learning-Based Safety-Stability-Driven Control for Safety-Critical Systems under Model Uncertainties
item.description: Supplementary notes can be added here, including code and math.

item.title: October 2020: New article of the National Postdoctoral Academic Forum on “Internet of Things and Wireless Communication Technology,” China.
item.description: Present a learning-based safety-preserving control policy for autonomous vehicles under model uncertainties in a mixed traffic flow!
